instructions.name: burn_property_tokens
docs: Allows investors to burn their tokens, reducing circulating supply.

instructions.name: claim_revenue
docs: Claim proportional share of revenue for an epoch
Token holders call this to receive their dividend based on their
token balance at the time of deposit.
- Can only claim each epoch once

accounts.name: investor_token_account
docs: Investor's token account - to verify balance

accounts.name: claim_record
docs: Claim Record PDA - proves investor hasn't claimed this epoch yet

accounts.name: revenue_vault
docs: Revenue Vault PDA - holds the SOL

instructions.name: create_property_mint
docs: Create a new property mint with TransferHook extension
This is the recommended way to create a property as it:
1. Creates a Token-2022 mint with TransferHook extension
All subsequent transfers will automatically verify KYC via transfer_hook_execute.
* `total_supply` - Maximum tokens that can be minted

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority who will own the property

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account to be created

instructions.name: deposit_revenue
docs: Deposit rental revenue for distribution to token holders
Creates a new revenue epoch and deposits SOL into the vault.
Token holders can then claim their proportional share.
* `epoch_number` - Sequential epoch number for this distribution
* `amount` - Amount of SOL (in lamports) to deposit
- Only property authority can deposit revenue

accounts.name: revenue_epoch
docs: Revenue Epoch PDA - created for each distribution period

accounts.name: revenue_vault
docs: Revenue Vault PDA - holds the SOL for this epoch

instructions.name: initialize_extra_account_metas
docs: Initialize the ExtraAccountMetaList for Transfer Hook
This must be called after creating a mint with the TransferHook extension.
It defines which additional accounts are required during transfers
(specifically, the destination wallet's SAS attestation for KYC verification).

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint this transfer hook is for

instructions.name: initialize_investment_vault
docs: Initialize investment vault for a property
Must be called before accepting investments. Sets up the vault
to track escrow, reserve fund, and fee distribution.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Property authority (must be the property owner)

accounts.name: reserve_fund
docs: Reserve Fund PDA - just derive to verify

accounts.name: seller
docs: Seller wallet that will receive escrow releases

instructions.name: invest_in_property
docs: Invest in a property - pay SOL and receive tokens
This is the main investment instruction that:
2. Transfers SOL from investor with distribution:
* `sol_amount` - Amount of SOL to invest (in lamports)
- Atomic transaction: payment + mint happen together

accounts.name: investor
docs: Investor making the investment (pays SOL, receives tokens)

accounts.name: investment_vault
docs: Investment Vault PDA (holds escrow + reserve accounting)

accounts.name: investor_credential
docs: Hub Credential account for investor KYC

instructions.name: mint_property_tokens
docs: Mint property tokens to an investor
Requires valid KYC via SAS attestation.
Only the property authority can mint tokens.
- Verifies SAS attestation exists and is valid

accounts.name: investor
docs: Investor receiving tokens (must have valid Hub Credential)

accounts.name: investor_token_account
docs: Investor's token account (created externally via createAssociatedTokenAccountIdempotent)
Must be the ATA for the investor and mint using Token-2022

accounts.name: investor_credential
docs: Hub Credential account for investor KYC
This account must be owned by HUB_CREDENTIAL_PROGRAM_ID and contain valid KYC credential

instructions.name: toggle_property_status
docs: Enables or disables token minting for this property.
Only the property authority can toggle status.

instructions.name: transfer_hook_execute
docs: Transfer Hook Execute - KYC verification on transfers
This instruction is automatically called by Token-2022 during every transfer.
It verifies that the destination wallet has valid KYC (SAS attestation).
- Verifies SAS attestation exists for destination wallet
- Ensures destination is not a sanctioned wallet

accounts.name: hub_credential
docs: Hub Credential for destination wallet (KYC verification)
This is the Hub Credential that proves the destination wallet has completed KYC.

instructions.name: update_property_details
docs: Only the property authority can update details.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: Only property authority can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidTotalSupply
errors.msg: Invalid total supply: must be greater than zero

errors.name: ExceedsMaxSupply
errors.msg: Exceeds maximum supply: cannot mint more tokens than total supply

errors.name: PropertyNotActive
errors.msg: Property is not active: minting is disabled

errors.name: KycVerificationRequired
errors.msg: KYC verification required: SAS attestation not found or invalid

errors.name: InvalidRentalYield
errors.msg: Invalid rental yield: must be between 0 and 10000 basis points (0-100%)

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient token balance for burn operation

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount: must be greater than zero

errors.name: NoTokenHolders
errors.msg: No token holders: cannot distribute revenue

errors.name: EpochNotFinalized
errors.msg: Epoch not finalized: cannot claim yet

errors.name: CredentialExpired
errors.msg: Hub Credential expired: please renew your credential

errors.name: InvalidCredential
errors.msg: Invalid Hub Credential: credential not valid

errors.name: MilestoneNotReached
errors.msg: Milestone not reached: cannot release funds

errors.name: InvalidInvestmentAmount
errors.msg: Invalid investment amount: must be greater than zero

types.name: ClaimRecord
docs: Tracks individual investor claims for an epoch

fields.name: epoch
docs: The epoch this claim is for

types.name: HubCredentialVerified
docs: Event emitted when Hub Credential verification succeeds

types.name: InvestmentVault
docs: Tracks investment funds for a property
- Seller escrow: Released based on sales milestones
- Reserve fund: Permanent guarantee for maintenance/emergencies

fields.name: property_mint
docs: The property mint this vault belongs to

fields.name: total_invested
docs: Total SOL deposited by investors (in lamports)

fields.name: reserve_balance
docs: This stays in the vault as guarantee

fields.name: total_released_to_seller
docs: Total amount released to seller (in lamports)

fields.name: property_address
docs: Example: "Av. Paulista, 1000, São Paulo - SP, Brazil"

fields.name: total_value_usd
docs: Total property value in USD cents

fields.name: rental_yield_bps
docs: Annual rental yield in basis points

fields.name: metadata_uri
docs: Contains: legal documents, property photos, detailed specs

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority who can mint tokens and update property details

fields.name: mint
docs: Token-2022 mint address for this property

fields.name: total_supply
docs: Maximum number of tokens that can be minted

fields.name: circulating_supply
docs: Current number of tokens in circulation

types.name: RevenueEpoch
docs: Revenue distribution epoch - tracks a single distribution period

fields.name: property_state
docs: The property this epoch belongs to

fields.name: total_revenue
docs: Total revenue deposited for this epoch (in lamports)

fields.name: eligible_supply
docs: Total tokens eligible at time of deposit (snapshot)

fields.name: is_finalized
docs: Whether this epoch is finalized (no more deposits)
